responses.rationale: The segment describes the location of cases, not capabilities or preparedness.
The segment describes the scope of cases, not capabilities or preparedness.
The segment describes the cause of spread, not capabilities or preparedness.
The segment describes agricultural production volume, not capabilities or preparedness related to the threat.
The segment describes agricultural characteristics, not capabilities or preparedness related to the threat.
The segment describes the impact/scale of the outbreak, not capabilities or preparedness.
